articles.content: Since the official release of the Snapdragon 888 SoC, many manufacturers have officially confirmed that they will release smartphones with this chip. The first of these phones, Xiaomi Mi 11, will arr… [+2990 chars]

articles.title: Airtel Xstream service now available for non-Airtel users | BGR India - BGR India
articles.description: Airtel Xstream content subscription is now available for non-Airtel users as well at Rs 49 per month. Here are the details.
articles.content: Airtel Xstream service, which was so far limited to users who had Airtel postpaid, broadband, DTH, and prepaid connection, is now available for non-Airtel users as well. The company has confirmed tha… [+1787 chars]
